ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] A question or two
ygData.msgSnippet: Salutations Kristina!  OK, thanks for the information, that clears that up anyway.
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations Kristina!

<< You are always bound somewhere, >>

OK, thanks for the information, that clears that up
anyway.

<< I know that there have been talks about bind
poitions or items with bind charges for melee
classes(similar to gate potions), but I'm not sure if
Verrant has gone live with those or not. >>

That would be cool although probably beyond what I
could get right now anyway.

<< Remember most of us clerics are always willing to
help rez you if your bound far away from your corpse.
>>

Thanks. Is there a penalty for this of some kind,
losing items, exp. or something?

<< Check the /who for the zone to get the names of the
clerics in the zone before you start fighting if the
nearest city is rather far away that way you can send
them a tell when you die, most of the time they are
quiet willing to help you out. >>

Well, the example of what happened late last night
might be a good one. I had last bound in Kaladim (sp)
and needed to go to Steamfont in search of a Micro
Servo. I was wondering around doing OK but not finding
what I needed. There were a few fights but nothing I
couldn't handle when I came across some Minatour
Slavers. They were dark blue and there were a couple
of them so I didn't want to chance it alone. I started
back toward town to see if I could enlist someone to
come back with me and help free the Gnome slaves. On
the way I stopped and fought something and got about
half way wounded. I was standing there tossing a
couple minor heals on myself just in case I ran into
somehting else when I was attacked from behind by a
skeleton. I turned to fight but it was a white threat
and being half wounded already it finished me off.
I reappeared in Kelethin and started back to get my
body, but in the dark I think I missed my turn in
Lesser Feydark and I was ambushed by a Brownie and
killed again, so back to Kelethin.
Fortunately, a found a very kind lvl 54 Shadow night
that I knew who was online and met me and helped me
retrieve my bodies.
:o)
This isn't even the first time I've died once or twice
simply trying to retrieve the body from when I died
the first time.
Just gets kind of frustrating at times.

It's one game feature I would happily have done
without.
:o)

After helping me get my body she literally sat me down
in the game and had a long time with me about EQ and
pointed out a few facts of life on Narreth etc. :o) It
was very sweet of her, and I picked up a few pointers
as well.

:o)
Brangvyne
lvl 10 Wood Elf Ranger
